short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BİNA.AZ Plus displays some extra parameters on the property card, provides seller filter and notifications about new properties.
short.ru: BİNA.AZ Plus показывает дополнительные параметры объявления, предоставляет фильтр по продавцe и оповещения о новых объявлениях.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BİNA.AZ Plus allows you to see the seller type of the property directly on the search result page which will save you time by avoiding navigating to the property details page to get this information. Also, the extension adds a seller filter under the search bar to hide undesired content. It will save much of your time when looking for a house or an apartment for rent or purchase.

Now we introduce a new feature to save current search parameters to track new properties and get notified in time. You can see the new properties metadata on the extension page for all saved searches without the need to go to the site and check only the properties that you are interested in.

Search your house of dreams with comfort!
long.ru: BİNA.AZ Plus allows to see the seller type of the property directly on the search result lists that will save your time by avoiding to navigate to the property details page so get this information. Also the extension adds seller type filter under the search bar to hide undesired content. It will save much of your time during looking for a house or an apartment for rent or purchase.
